thread.title: Why Broadcom Should Walk Away

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Why Broadcom Should Walk Away
text:
Wanting to do a deal isn’t the same as needing to do one. Broadcom at this point should remember the benefits of being in the former position.
The long weekend brought more twists and turns to the chip maker’s effort to acquire Qualcomm. On the one hand, Broadcom more or less garnered the support of proxy advisory firms Glass Lewis and Institutional Shareholder Services in its effort to replace Qualcomm’s board.
